en.html: Let's see how this experiment works
en.text: Let's see how this experiment works

__novar.SSML: Let's see how this experiment works

SA1T1enumProcess1.SSML: We will mix a crystal salt or sugar in water so it dissolves.

SA1T2enumProcess1.SSML: We will put a single mint into a bottle of soda.

SA2T1enumProcess1.SSML: We will place an ice cube in a glass filled with 237 milliliters of water.

SA2T2enumProcess1.SSML: We will pump 5 grams of Helium at 15 degrees Celsius into a balloon.

SA3T1enumProcess1.SSML: We will place a ball on the ramp.

SA3T2enumProcess1.SSML: We will place an object into a graduated cylinder filled with water.

SA4T1enumProcess1.SSML: We will plant twelve sunflowers in the ground in a greenhouse at the beginning of Spring.

SA4T2enumProcess1.SSML: We will add fifty grams of algae to a fish tank filled with 16 liters of distilled water.

$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess1.SA1T1enumProcess1: We will mix a crystal salt or sugar in water so it dissolves.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess1.SA1T2enumProcess1: We will put a single mint into a bottle of soda.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess1.SA2T1enumProcess1: We will place an ice cube in a glass filled with 237 milliliters of water.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess1.SA2T2enumProcess1: We will pump 5 grams of Helium at 15 degrees Celsius into a balloon.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess1.SA3T1enumProcess1: We will place a ball on the ramp.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess1.SA3T2enumProcess1: We will place an object into a graduated cylinder filled with water.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess1.SA4T1enumProcess1: We will plant twelve sunflowers in the ground in a greenhouse at the beginning of Spring.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess1.SA4T2enumProcess1: We will add fifty grams of algae to a fish tank filled with 16 liters of distilled water.

SA1T1enumProcess2.SSML: We will continue to add the crystals and mix until not more crystals can be dissolved in the water. This is the saturation point.

SA1T2enumProcess2.SSML: Bubbles forming a soda geyser may come out of the bottle.

SA2T1enumProcess2.SSML: The ice cube will eventually completely melt.

SA2T2enumProcess2.SSML: Then we will place the balloon outside for 30 minutes.

SA3T1enumProcess2.SSML: The ball will roll down the ramp.

SA3T2enumProcess2.SSML: It will sink to the bottom.

SA4T1enumProcess2.SSML: The flowers will produce seeds then die by the end of the season.

SA4T2enumProcess2.SSML: We can measure the weight of the algae growth after one week.

$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess2.SA1T1enumProcess2: We will continue to add the crystals and mix until not more crystals can be dissolved in the water. This is the saturation point.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess2.SA1T2enumProcess2: Bubbles forming a soda geyser may come out of the bottle.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess2.SA2T1enumProcess2: The ice cube will eventually completely melt.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess2.SA2T2enumProcess2: Then we will place the balloon outside for 30 minutes.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess2.SA3T1enumProcess2: The ball will roll down the ramp.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess2.SA3T2enumProcess2: It will sink to the bottom.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess2.SA4T1enumProcess2: The flowers will produce seeds then die by the end of the season.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess2.SA4T2enumProcess2: We can measure the weight of the algae growth after one week.

SA1T1enumProcess3.SSML: Then we will put a string in the water.

SA1T2enumProcess3.SSML: We can measure the height of the soda geyser.

SA2T1enumProcess3.SSML: We can measure the time it takes for the ice cube to melt in water.

SA2T2enumProcess3.SSML: The temperature of the outside air is 27 degrees Celsius.

SA3T1enumProcess3.SSML: We will measure the balls speed at the bottom of the ramp.

SA3T2enumProcess3.SSML: We can measure the time it takes for the object to sink in water.

SA4T1enumProcess3.SSML: We can measure the number of seeds produced by the flowers at the end of the season.

$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess3.SA1T1enumProcess3: Then we will put a string in the water.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess3.SA1T2enumProcess3: We can measure the height of the soda geyser.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess3.SA2T1enumProcess3: We can measure the time it takes for the ice cube to melt in water.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess3.SA2T2enumProcess3: The temperature of the outside air is 27 degrees Celsius.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess3.SA3T1enumProcess3: We will measure the balls speed at the bottom of the ramp.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess3.SA3T2enumProcess3: We can measure the time it takes for the object to sink in water.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess3.SA4T1enumProcess3: We can measure the number of seeds produced by the flowers at the end of the season.

SA1T1enumProcess4.SSML: We can measure the weight of the crystal growth after two weeks.

SA2T2enumProcess4.SSML: We can measure the temperature of the gas after 30 minutes.

$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess4.SA1T1enumProcess4: We can measure the weight of the crystal growth after two weeks.
$EFO_S_A?_T?|enumProcess4.SA2T2enumProcess4: We can measure the temperature of the gas after 30 minutes.

SA1T1fourcanchange.SSML: In this experiment, there are only four things we can change. Any of these might make a difference in the amount of crystal growth on a string in water. These are the four variables you can test in this experiment

SA1T2fourcanchange.SSML: In this experiment, there are only four things we can change. Any of these might make a difference in the reaction between the soda and mint. These are the four variables you can test in this experiment

SA2T1fourcanchange.SSML: In this experiment, there are only four things we can change. Any of these might make a difference in the time it takes for the ice cube to melt in water. These are the four variables you can test in this experiment

SA2T2fourcanchange.SSML: In this experiment, there are only four things we can change. Any of these might make a difference in the temperature of gas in the balloon. These are the four variables you can test in this experiment

SA3T1fourcanchange.SSML: In this experiment, there are only four things we can change. Any of these might make a difference in the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp. These are the four variables you can test in this experiment

SA3T2fourcanchange.SSML: In this experiment, there are only four things we can change. Any of these might make a difference in the time of it takes for objects to sink in water. These are the four variables you can test in this experiment

SA4T1fourcanchange.SSML: In this experiment, there are only four things we can change. Any of these might make a difference in the number of seeds produced by the flowers at the end of the season. These are the four variables you can test in this experiment

SA4T2fourcanchange.SSML: In this experiment, there are only four things we can change. Any of these might make a difference in the weight of the algae after one week. These are the four variables you can test in this experiment
